name: Hyper Magical Star Princess
description:
My entry for the "Touch the Stars" game jam.

The dreadful princess Starla is unceremoniously dethroned by Queen Calamity. Can Starla fight her way back to her castle and reclaim her kingdom? That depends.

As a member of the Astral royalty, Starla can capture her Stardust-based enemies and repurpose them, as either obedient allies or as powerful weapons. To succeed, she'll need to exploit this power and provide herself with a steady supply of body guards, healers, and wizards to support her on her journey.

  • Gather rare candy
  • Collect al 15 enemies in your inventory (there are no achievements but still go for it).
  • Address the many concerns and complaints of your peasants.
  • Become hilariously powerful.
  • Take a nap.

COOL HINTZ BELOW:

  • Fire > Wind > Water > Fire, Dark and Light are equally effective against one another.
  • You can only have one ally at a time, summoning a new one replaces the old.
  • Taking a nap might actually be OP, holy mole.
  • When you use stardust to forge a weapon, you get a super powerful weapon that gives you some new skills, but its lost after battle. It's best to save weapon forging for bosses.
  • Save often!
